lines.Line: Okay, okay, I checked. We have: Earl Grey, English Breakfast, CinnamonNEWLINEStick, Camomile, Mint Medley, Blackberry, and.. oh, wait, there's one more, um.. LemonNEWLINESoother. You're not the guy that asked for the tea, are you? (Guy shakes his head) Okay

lines.Line: Marcel. Bring me the rice, c'mon. Bring me the rice, c'mon. Good boy. GoodNEWLINEboy. C'mere, gimme the rice. (Marcel brings the rice) Thank you, good boy. lines.Line: Now, now the one in the feather boa, that's Dr. Francis. Now, she usedNEWLINEto be a man. Okay, now look, see, there's Raven. We hate her.
